scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run setup:zkey && npm run setup:verifier
scripts.compile: mkdir -p artifacts; for circuit in circuits/*.circom; do circom $circuit --r1cs --wasm --sym -o artifacts;done
scripts.setup:zkey: for circuit in artifacts/*.r1cs; do snarkjs groth16 setup $circuit powersOfTau28_hez_final_15.ptau artifacts/zkey/$(basename -- $circuit .r1cs).zkey;done
scripts.setup:verifier: for zkey in artifacts/zkeys/*.zkey; do snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier $zkey artifacts/verifiers/$(basename -- $zkey .zkey | perl -nE 'say ucfirst').sol;done
